summary: Set during the 1950s on a British-ruled Caribbean island, this drama deals with local politics, interracial relationships, social inequality, racism, adultery, and murder.
cast: James Mason|Joan Fontaine|Dorothy Dandridge|Joan Collins|Michael Rennie|Harry Belafonte|Diana Wynyard|John Williams|Stephen Boyd|Patricia Owens|Basil Sydney|John Justin|Ronald Squire|Hartley Power|Phil Trim|Barbara Upton
title: Una isla al sol
